abstract: Donald J Trump attempts to clarify his immigration plan in Iowa speech after drawing severe criticism for seemingly backtracking from his earlier stands; candidate remains vague on crucial issue of how to deal with undocumented immigrants who have not committed crimes.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump said he would remove illegal immigrants who committed crimes, but he sidestepped what to do about the millions of others in the country.
snippet: Mr. Trump said he would remove illegal immigrants who committed crimes, but he sidestepped what to do about the millions of others in the country....

headline.main: Donald Trump Tries to Clarify Immigration Plan, but Avoids Key Issue
headline.print_headline: After Confusion, Trump Tries to Clarify Immigration Plan
